title: Entertainment - Christina Aguilera Promises Her New Album Is “Coming” in Response to Fan’s Clever Message

og.description:
What a girl wants…is a new album from Christina Aguilera. Fortunately, the songstress confirmed one is on its way. It’s been more than five years since the five-time Grammy winner released her last studio album, Lotus. Now, fans are getting antsy for some new music from the powerhouse …
 


via...
